ygData.subject: Re: TRAINING
ygData.msgSnippet: Artificial life forms can learn to adapt to different situations by exposing themselves to it so gravity training would only help the bot if he were to fight

Artificial life forms can learn to adapt to different situations by exposing
themselves to it so gravity training would only help the bot if he were to
fight an inexperienced bot in it.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 3:46 PM
Subject: Re: TRAINING


> Quick question.  How would gravity help a robot?  They're mechanical.
That
> means they don't get stronger with practice.  The only reason to train
would
> be to relieve stress.
>
>
>
